meanings.definition: A garment worn for swimming, typically consisting of a top and bottom.
meanings.sent1: She put on her swimsuit before heading to the pool.
meanings.sent2: During summer, many people wear a swimsuit at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The swimsuit looked like a colorful fish in the water.
meanings.sent4: Her swimsuit was a shield against the chilly ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The swimsuit hugged her body like a second skin.

meanings.definition: To wear a swimsuit for swimming.
meanings.sent1: I will swimsuit up and join you in the pool.
meanings.sent2: They swimsuit every weekend at the community center.
meanings.sent3: He decided to swimsuit even though it was raining outside.
meanings.sent4: She swimsuited gracefully through the clear blue water.
meanings.sent5: Swimsuiting in the lake felt refreshing on a hot day.
